title: What Lia Thomas Could Mean for Women's Elite Sports

sentence: Despite receiving support from some of her rivals and more than 300 NCAA, Team USA and Olympic swimmers, Thomas faced numerous attacks from conservatives, like GOP Senator Marsha Blackburn and Florida Governor Ron DeSantis, who refused to recognize the University of Pennsylvania swimmer as the winner in this year's championships.
author: Katherine Fung
title: Swimmer Lia Thomas Felt Weaker, Slower in Competition After Transitioning
